page.title: 13LOCAL NEWS IN BERKHAMSTED.
page.content: The following head-lines appeared in the local Berkhamsted Gazette during the last year, issues which we feel reflect the wishes and fears for Berkhamsted and its residents. March 9, "Wellcome-ICI deal great step for town, the historic name, 'Cooper' is returning to Berkhamted". March 16, "Arts Festical, rivetting performances on Sunday". Sept. 7,"Old folks home plans dropped. Berkhamsted may not get its old folks home in Manor Street". Oct. 26,"By-pass first, then homes, says council". Oct. 26,"Crumbling clock tower may be rebuilt taller". Nov. 23, "Mixed feelings greet by-pass decision". Dec. 21,Armed rapist claims 2nd.victim. March 28,'85, "More homes to be built".
